name: graduation-project
description: Graduation Project - Energy Production and Weather Relationship: Data Analysis and Forecasting
author: Mustafa Erhan Portakal

data_collection.description: Collect solar energy and temperature data from various sources.
tasks: Collect solar irradiance and sunshine duration data.
Data can be gathered from public or private sources.

data_processing.description: Clean, preprocess, and transform the collected data.
tasks: Clean and handle missing or erroneous data.
Normalize and format the data consistently.
Consider resampling the data for time series analysis.

correlation_analysis.description: Analyze the correlation between solar energy and temperature.
tasks: Use statistical methods to analyze the correlation.
Examine linearity and potential lag in the correlation.

visualization.description: Visualize the data and the relationship between solar energy and temperature.
tasks: Utilize distribution plots, line charts, and heatmaps for analysis.
Compare different types of graphs to visualize the relationship.
Use time series plots to visualize seasonal variations and trends.

machine_learning.description: Develop machine learning models to predict solar energy based on temperature.
tasks: Create regression models (linear or nonlinear) or time series forecasting models.
Evaluate model accuracy and reliability with various parameters.
